content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://storageazuredemo2023.dfs.core.windows.net/sample01/abc/datafiles/abc.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ';',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        FIRSTROW  = 2,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
